title: Cody Simpson joins Miley Cyrus and her mom Tish for breakfast
text:
He told how he was 'very, very happy' with his new pop star girlfriend on Friday.

And Cody Simpson is clearly delighted with his relationship, joining Miley Cyrus and her mom Tish for breakfast on Saturday.

The trio headed to Aeirloom Bakery for breakfast in the Toluca Lake neighborhood of Los Angeles.

Family time: Miley Cyrus and her mom Tish were joined by the singer's new boyfriend Cody Simpson for breakfast in Toluca Lake in Los Angeles on Saturday

New love: Miley arrived with Cody, 22, who has said she is 'passionate'

Passionate: He told how he was 'very, very happy' with his new pop star girlfriend on Friday

Miley arrived at the side of Cody, before the trio ate together. Cody then headed off, while Miley and her mother stayed to chat a little longer before they walked back to Tish's house.

A source who spotted Cody and Miley at the bakery told DailyMail.com: 'Miley and Cody seem like old time friends, just very at ease with one another, very comfortable.'

The outing came hours after Cody, 22, sang the praises of his new lady love while at the star-studded launch of Tiffany & Co. Mens line in Los Angeles.

'She's creative,' he told People magazine. 'She's very passionate about what she does, and I'm very similar in that sense. That's why we get along so well.'

Meeting mom: The new relationship seems to be going well

And it's no wonder Cody is happy - he recently revealed he first fell for Miley, 26, when he was 12.

They became friends but he had to wait 10 years for things to get romantic as she was 'happy with another Australian.'

That would be her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth. The couple split in early summer after six months of marriage and a 10-year, on-off relationship.

Does she approve? Miley is close to her mother, Tish

Old friends turned lovers: A source who spotted Cody and Miley at the bakery told DailyMail.com: 'Miley and Cody seem like old time friends, just very at ease with one another, very comfortable'

Miley had a brief fling with Kaitlyn Carter before her friendship with Cody became something more serious.

Cody explained: 'The reason why it hasn't been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we've been friends for so long,' adding they 'found each other again in a space where we're both not partying, working real hard, and it just keeps things healthy and it's good.'

So stylish: Cody Simpson dished about his relationship with Miley Cyrus at the Tiffany & Co. Mens Launch in Los Angeles on Friday

New beau: Miley posted this sweet camera selfie that a topless Cody shot of them in a bathroom, which he captioned, 'She made it home. Recovering from surgery send all vibes'

Now he is set to release a new song that he wrote for Miley while she was in hospital recovering from a nasty bout of tonsillitis.

'She's pretty much forcing me to put it out,' he told People. 'She was like, 'If you don't put this s*** out, I'm putting it out on your behalf for you. I'm getting your Spotify login and doing this s*** myself.' '

Meanwhile, Cody shared part of the track on Instagram last week.
description: He told how he was 'very, very happy' with his new pop star girlfriend on Friday.
